name: Espresso
details: Espresso is a concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans. It is the base for many other coffee drinks like lattes and cappuccinos.

name: Latte
details: A latte is a popular coffee drink made with a single or double shot of espresso and steamed milk, topped with a small amount of foam. It's creamy and smooth.

name: Americano
details: Americano is a simple coffee drink made by diluting espresso with hot water. It's less intense than espresso but retains its rich flavor.

name: Flat White
description: Smooth coffee with steamed microfoam milk.
details: Flat White is a velvety coffee drink made with a double shot of espresso and steamed microfoam milk. It's richer than a latte but smoother than a cappuccino.

name: Mocha
description: Rich coffee with a chocolatey twist.
details: Mocha is a chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup or powder. Itâ€™s a delightful blend of coffee and dessert.

name: Brewed Coffee
description: Regular brewed coffee with a rich, robust flavor.

name: Cheesecake
description: A smooth and creamy dessert with a buttery crust.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Decadent chocolate cake with fresh berries on the side.
